Class HeadquartersServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.dp.spring.parallel.common.services.BusinessService

All Implemented Interfaces:
HeadquartersService, com.dp.spring.springcore.observer.PublisherService<User,Headquarters>
@Service public class HeadquartersServiceImpl extends BusinessService implements HeadquartersService

    • notifyObservers

      public <C, OS extends com.dp.spring.springcore.observer.ObserverService<User, Headquarters, C>> void notifyObservers(Headquarters headquarters, OS observerService, C context)
      Notifying each observer to react to a headquarters event, according to the given reaction strategy.
      Specified by:
      notifyObservers in interface com.dp.spring.springcore.observer.PublisherService<User,Headquarters>
      Type Parameters:
      C - the type of the context to consider for observer to react properly
      OS - an observer service strategy to call for triggering the reaction of each observer
      Parameters:
      headquarters - the publisher triggering the event
      observerService - the strategy defining the reaction for each observer to call
      context - the context to consider for observer to react properly
